verses.name: John 9:30
verses.text: The man answered and said unto them, Why herein is a marvellous thing, that ye know not from whence he is, and yet he hath opened mine eyes.

verses.name: John 9:31
verses.text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners: but if any man be a worshipper of God, and doeth his will, him he heareth.

verses.name: John 9:32
verses.text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind.

verses.name: John 9:33
verses.text: If this man were not of God, he could do nothing.
